name: Onzil
description:
A game where you play as a fallen warrior trying to enter the true afterlife. Your god has given you a chance to do this by collecting the essence of denizens that inhabit the lands of the inbetween. This land is gloomy and for the most part devoid of natural life, only those creatures that have lost their way and curse to roam eternal are present. 

Travers the 2D environment as you explore and master the one weapon that you have been granted, A magical Onzil. This weapon is powerful and anything it hits dies in 1 hit however this weapon is vindictive and if it doesn’t hit an enemy it will seek you out to satiate its bloodlust.
